alert.note: Alert for Central Chelan County; Western Chelan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 28 at 1:03PM PDT until March 29 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PDT WEDNESDAY ABOVE 3500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 3500 feet. Snow accumulations between 2 and 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Western Chelan county south of Highway 2, including Blewett Pass. * WHEN...Until 8 AM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will begin this evening with snow accumulating on the roads after 9pm.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Chelan County; Western Chelan County
